alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 29 at 4:50AM MDT until October 29 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT /1 PM CDT/ TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to 3 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest Kansas and southwest Nebraska. The higher snowfall amounts are anticipated to extend along a narrow line extending from Flagler to Saint Francis and Atwood. * WHEN...Until noon MDT /1 PM CDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Snow cover on area roads will create hazardous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...visibilities below one mile are possible within any narrow bands of snow and could make for hazardous travel.
info.instruction: Hazardous travel conditions are expected across the advisory area. If you must travel, slow down, turn off cruise control, and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway onramps and offramps where accidents are more likely to occur. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
